results.title: Simvastatin protects against intestinal ischemia/reperfusion-induced pulmonary artery dysfunction.

results.title: KMUP-1 inhibits pulmonary artery proliferation by targeting serotonin receptors/transporter and NO synthase, inactivating RhoA and suppressing AKT/ERK phosphorylation.
results.text_hl: In @CHEMICAL_Monocrotaline @CHEMICAL_MESH:D016686 @@@MCT@@@-treated @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@, KMUP-1 f (5 mg/kg p.o.; 1mg/kg i.p.x 21 days) decreased proliferation (@GENE_PCNA @GENE_25737 @@@PCNA@@@-positive) cells and @GENE_SLC6A4 @GENE_6532 @@@5-HTT@@@-expression in lung and @CHEMICAL_Serotonin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D012701 @@@5-HT@@@ levels in plasma. In isolated @<m>DISEASE_Stenosis_Pulmonary_Artery</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000071079 @@@PA@@@, KMUP-1 and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (0.1-100 muM) inhibited @CHEMICAL_Serotonin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D012701 @@@5-HT@@@ (10 muM)-induced @<m>DISEASE_Stenosis_Pulmonary_Artery</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000071079 @@@PA@@@ constriction.

citations.NLM: Chung HH, Dai ZK, Wu BN, Yeh JL, Chai CY, Chu KS, Liu CP, Chen IJ. KMUP-1 inhibits pulmonary artery proliferation by targeting serotonin receptors/transporter and NO synthase, inactivating RhoA and suppressing AKT/ERK phosphorylation. Vascul Pharmacol. 2010 Nov-Dec;53(5-6):239-49. PMID: 20870034

results.title: Pulmonary arterial hypertension: new insights and new hope.
results.text_hl: All three therapies appear to prevent and reduce @<m>DISEASE_Stenosis_Pulmonary_Artery</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000071079 @@@pulmonary arterial medial hyperplasia@@@ through their anti-proliferative and/or pro-apoptotic effects: @GENE_SLC6A4 @GENE_6532 @@@serotonin transporter@@@ inhibitors by blocking @CHEMICAL_Serotonin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D012701 @@@serotonin@@@ uptake; @CHEMICAL_Dichloroacetic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003999 @@@dichloroacetate@@@ by activating voltage-gated potassium channels; and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ by preventing activation of small GTPases.

citations.NLM: Martin KB, Klinger JR, Rounds SI. Pulmonary arterial hypertension: new insights and new hope. Respirology. 2006 Jan;11(1):6-17. PMID: 16423196
